m_szDocSumamry: 0 Posted May 6, 2008 The fate of the renewable electricity production tax credit (PTC), which provides incentives for power generated from wind, solar, and other alternative energy sources, is apparently still in doubt. Last month the US Senate approved a one-year extension of the credit as an amendment to a housing bill, but the House of Representatives is balking at the provision's cost. Previous efforts to extend the credit and pay for it by revoking tax benefits for the oil industry failed .
